title: The Writer's Almanac for Wednesday, January 12, 2022
description: Myself, I'm a very realistic person. [...]But when I write, I write weird." --novelist Haruki Murakami, born on this day in Kyoto, Japan,1949.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
